body.configuration_panel_json: [      {        "description": "Title of Duplicate:",        "fieldset": [          {            "name": "mpTitle",            "type": "text",            "value": " "          }        ]      },      {        "description": "Series Id:",        "fieldset": [            {            "name": "seriesId",            "type": "text",            "value": " "          }        ]      },      {        "description": "Insert the number of duplicated events",        "fieldset": [          {            "name": "numberOfEvents",            "type": "number",            "label": "Number of Events",            "min": "1",            "max": "25",            "value": "1"          }        ]      },      {        "fieldset": [          {            "name": "noCopySuffix",            "type": "checkbox",            "label": "Do not use copy suffix",            "value": false          }        ]      }    ]
